name: Varisian Tattoo
source: Rise of the Runelords Player's Guide pg. 15
text: You bear intricate tattoos that inspire and empower your natural magic ability. These tattoos mark you as a worker of the ancient traditions of Varisian magic. A Varisian tattoo typically consists of a long string of complex characters from the Thassilonian alphabet.
benefit:
Select a school of magic (other than divination) in which you have Spell Focus—you cast spells from this school at +1 caster level. Additionally, you gain a single spell-like ability usable up to three times per day. The spell-like ability gained (and its Varisian name) are as follows:

Abjuration (avidais): resistance
Conjuration (idolis): acid splash
Enchantment (carnasia): daze
Evocation (ragario): dancing lights
Illusion (vangloris): ghost sound
Necromancy (voratalo): touch of fatigue
Transmutation (avaria): mage hand
text_zh: 你身上所负有的刺青激发并增强你自身的魔法力量。这些刺青时刻提醒你是古老而又传统的瓦瑞西安（Varisian）魔法传承者。传统的瓦瑞西安刺青通常由一长串瑟西隆语（Thassilonian）字母表中的字符组成。
benefit_zh:
选择一种你已经拥有对应的法术专攻专长的魔法学派（预言系之外的）——你施放该学派的法术时施法者等级+1级。此外，你获得一种每日可以使用3次的类法术能力。对应学派的类法术能力（以及它的瓦瑞西安名称）如后述所述：

防护系（avidais）：提升抗力（resistance）

咒法系（idolis）：酸液飞溅（acid splash）

附魔系（carnasia）：晕眩术（daze）

塑能系（ragario）：舞光术（dancing lights）

幻术系（vangloris）：幻音术（ghost sound）

死灵系（voratalo）：疲乏之触（touch of fatigue）

变化系（avaria）：法师之手（mage hand）
